name: My Boice
description:
The story narrates an introspective journey where you can make a reflection about the woman's body and her power of choice. In it, you must go through all its corners fulfilling a series of tasks to be able to reach the outcome, the final decision.

This is my first interactive design ever, so I'm looking forward to improving my skills.

I hope you like it!

(For a full experience use headphones)
